name: Flora.io
tools: Laravel, Express, Vue.js, Node.js, Sass, VS Code, FirebaseDB, Arduino
description: This was made in conjunction with my Interactive Media Specialist program where I worked in a group of 3 as a full-stack developer and project manager. The success of the project was executed by setting clear goals and having open communication about problems or enhancements. My main contributions were creating the branding, layouts, managing the project and building out sections of the GUI.

name: Get Smokin'
tools: Mongoose, Express, Vue.js, Node.js, Sass, VS Code, Adobe XD
description: I created Get Smoking'  as a passion project out of my love and drive to create authentic southern barbecue with my own spin on the dishes. This website is for like minded people who want to make awesome bbq for their friends and family. Here you can find a wide variety of recipes including pork, fish, poultry and beef, these are all recipes I have created over the past few years of cooking. Users can also access my blog where I share tips and tricks to mastering the pit.

name: Meta World
tools: Express, Vue.js, Node.js, Sass, CoinGecko API, VS Code, Adobe XD
description: I designed and developed Meta World to further my knowledge of implementing open REST APIâ€™s into a Vue.js application. This app utilizes the CoinGecko API and renders the live market data to the front-end of the application. Users can also click and view more live market information about the selected currency. My strong passion about economics and stock markets is what I believe let to the success to this application.
